postgres:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS predictions_raw (
      id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
      ts_open BIGINT,
      raw_response TEXT,
      parse_ok BOOLEAN,
      prompt_hash CHAR(64)
    );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS predictions_core (
      raw_id INTEGER REFERENCES predictions_raw(id),
      asset TEXT,
      direction CHAR(1),
      entry_from NUMERIC,
      entry_to NUMERIC,
      sl NUMERIC,
      tp NUMERIC,
      horizon_min SMALLINT,
      meta JSONB
    );
sqlite:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS predictions_raw (
      id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
      ts_open INTEGER,
      raw_response TEXT,
      parse_ok INTEGER,
      prompt_hash TEXT
    );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS predictions_core (
      raw_id INTEGER,
      asset TEXT,
      direction CHAR(1),
      entry_from NUMERIC,
      entry_to NUMERIC,
      sl NUMERIC,
      tp NUMERIC,
      horizon_min INTEGER,
      meta TEXT
    );
